text: @ Consider a random experiment where two fair coins are tossed. Let A be the event that denotes HEAD on both the throws, B be the event that denotes HEAD on the first throw, and C' be the event 4 that denotes HEAD on the second throw. Which of the following statements is/are TRUE? @ A. A and B are independent. B. A and C'are independent. C. B and C are independent. D. Prob(B | C) = Prob(B) D oD aDd
